thread.title: Fodor's Week in Travel: Do Something Different
thread.title_full: Fodor's Week in Travel: Do Something Different

title: Fodor's Week in Travel: Do Something Different
text:
Fodor's Week in Travel: Do Something Different Fodor's Week in Travel: Do Something Different Posted by Sara Quaranta on July 10, 2015 at 12:00:00 PM EDT | Post a Comment 
Sometimes the biggest traveling rewards come when you step outside your comfort zone and try something out of the ordinary. Whether you want to embark on a new adventure by traveling alone or by staying in a tree-house hotel, our weekly roundup has your next favorite trip experience covered. 10 Incredible Tree-House Hotels in the U.S. 
Unleash your inner child and live in the treetops during your next vacation. 10 Reasons to Travel Alone 
For more meaningful experiences, a confidence boost, and some alone time to recharge, make your next journey a solo one . 15 Picturesque Lighthouse Hotels Around the World 
For a new spin on your stay, settle in at a remote lighthouse , where you can hear crashing waves and the faint sound of the foghorn as you drift off. World's Most Amazing Helicopter Rides 
Check out some of the world's most beautiful landscapes and skylines from a new perspective: soaring overhead . 
Photo Credit: Top to bottom: Courtesy of Missouri Treehouse Cabins; Dudarev Mikhail / Shutterstock; corsewall lighthouse hotel by andy muir CC BY 2.0; Sphraner | Dreamstime.com
